title: Another complaint or misunderstanding.
body: So, today, I've played and won a few Leona games. My first win got me rank 6, my second got me a Rank 7 token, but my third and last Leona win for whatever reason, got me an A+ and I did a lot better in my last game. I don't know what goes towards an S game after this patch, but it's seriously painful to think you've done that well and not get an S. Apparently dying as a support is more rewarding than a flawless game. Sure, in my first two wins, I got a couple more assists, but I also KSed and died in them too. I'm open to discuss this too, though I'm a little salty. My apologies.

replies.body: The A+ game went on longer, so you probably didn't maintain as high of a per minute score. A certain score in 20 minutes isn't worth as much 20 minutes later.
Oh, okay. It's just unfortunate, we were pretty far ahead but weren't able to close out the game faster than we did.
